actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct Senate Legal Counsel to Intervene in Consumer Energy Council of America, Inc., et al. v. Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, et al. Nos. 80-2184, 80-2313 (D. C. Cir.).

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to intervene in Consumer Energy Council of America, Inc., et al. v. Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.

titles.title: A resolution to direct Senate Legal Counsel to Intervene in Consumer Energy Council of America, Inc., et al. v. Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, et al. Nos. 80-2184, 80-2313 (D. C. Cir.).
